title: Twisted dragon trophy

properties.name: description
properties.value: The twisted dragon trophy is a cosmetic reward that could be obtained by being in the top 1% of players in the Leagues Hiscores by the end of the Twisted League, which required having at least 20,830 League points to do so. Consequently, this means there were 1,103 players eligible for the trophy. When equipped, the trophy can be right-clicked to perform the Trophy Emote.

Item ID24372
A player performing the trophy emote.

The twisted dragon trophy is a cosmetic reward that could be obtained by being in the top 1% of players in the Leagues Hiscores by the end of the Twisted League, which required having at least 20,830 League points to do so. Consequently, this means there were 1,103 players eligible for the trophy. When equipped, the trophy can be right-clicked to perform the Trophy Emote.

The trophy can be displayed by using it on furniture built in the League hall's pedestal space.

If lost, players can reclaim it from the Leagues Tutor, or from furniture built in the League hall's trophy case space.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 May 2022
(update)

The item's weight has been decreased from 15.000 kg to 1.500 kg.

6 January 2021
(update)

The item was recoloured slightly.

16 January 2020
(update)
  • The item is now obtainable by eligible players.
  • The item's name was changed from "Twisted league dragon trophy" to "Twisted dragon trophy".
  • The examine text was changed; previously, it was "That's one ferocious looking trophy."
14 November 2019
(update)

The item was added to the game.
